Package com.ntu.scse

Class RoomService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.RoomService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RoomService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the hotel's Room Service that contains a list of all menus and order as well as methods for manipulating menus and order. One Room Service contain the entire list of menus and orders
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomService

        public RoomService​(java.util.ArrayList<Menu> m,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Order> o)
        Create a new RoomService with a list of menu and order The constructor will check for existing list data
        Parameters:
        m - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.
        o - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.

    • Method Detail

      • ShowRoomServiceMenuOption

        public void ShowRoomServiceMenuOption​()
        Display all the available Menu option for client 1) Read Menu 2) Add item to menu 3) Remove item from menu 4) Update menu item 5) Return main screen

      • ShowRoomServiceOrderOption

        public void ShowRoomServiceOrderOption​(RoomMgr rm,
                                       BillMgr bm)
        Display all the available Order option for client 1) View order allow client to select whether they want to view all orders or by room no. 2) Add order allow client to add order only if the room is occupied. 3) Remove order allow client to remove order only if order is under the status of "Confirmed" and "Preparing" 4) Update order allow client to update order only if order is under the status of "Confirmed" and "Preparing". All updated order will change its status to "Confirmed". 5) Change order status allow client to change the order status to any of the available option, "Confirmed", "Preparing" and "Delivered" 6) Return will return the client to main.
        Parameters:
        rm - from RoomManager class
        bm - from BillMgr class

      • viewOrderByRoomID

        public boolean viewOrderByRoomID​(java.lang.String roomID)
        To view all selected orders based on room no
        Parameters:
        roomID - client enter the room no to view selected room order
        Returns:
        returns true if at least 1 order made by room, if no orders return false

        public void finalizeOrder​(java.lang.String roomNo)

      • changeOrderStatus

        public void changeOrderStatus​(java.lang.String roomNo,
                              int choice)
        Update the current order status
        Parameters:
        roomNo - the guest room no
        choice - the status choice, "Confirmed", "Preparing", "Delivered"

      • updateOrderItem

        public void updateOrderItem​(java.lang.String roomNo,
                            BillMgr bm)
        Update order item with the given option to update 1) quantity 2) remarks 3) update everything at once 4) return to main
        Parameters:
        roomNo - the guest room no.
        bm - the BillMgr class

      • getLastItemID

        public int getLastItemID​()
        The method to get the last item from the menu list to increase the index (menuID) for new item
        Returns:
        the ID of the last item in the list

      • getLastItemID

        public int getLastItemID​(java.lang.String roomNo)
        Get the last item from the order list based on the room no. If room makes another order, it will be reflected properly as their nth order.
        Parameters:
        roomNo - the guest room no.
        Returns:
        the ID of the last order in the list that matches the room number

      • saveMenuToFile

        the master menu list
